byline.contributor: The New York Times contributed reporting.

abstract: Former major league outfielder Dave Henderson dies at age 57 after suffering heart attack; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: With the Red Sox one strike from elimination in Game 5 of the American League Championship Series, Henderson hit a two-run homer against the California Angels to send the series back to Boston.

headline.main: Dave Henderson, ’86 Red Sox Hero With a Fateful Home Run, Dies at 57
headline.print_headline: Baseball; Dave Henderson, ’86 Red Sox Hero, Dies at 57

snippet: With the Red Sox one strike from elimination in Game 5 of the American League Championship Series, Henderson hit a two-run homer against the California Angels to send the series back to Boston.
